testsuite.name: Logging out
testsuite.system-out:
Feature: Logging out
--Output from Log out-- Scenario: Log out # Logout.feature:4 Given I am at the home page and logged in as "user1" # Logout_steps.groovy:7 When I click the logout button # Logout_steps.groovy:12 Then I should be redirected to the login page # Logout_steps.groovy:15

testsuite.name: logging in
testsuite.system-out:
Feature: logging in
--Output from Logging in-- Scenario: Logging in # Login.feature:4 Given I am at the login page # Login_steps.groovy:8 When I type "user1" in the username field and "password" in the password field and login # Login_steps.groovy:13 Then I should be able to see "user1" at the home page # Login_steps.groovy:16
